Document Sources.Sourced Statement: The Tennessee Association of Realtors is the sixth largest spender on Tennessee politics, according to the Tennessee Lookout’s database, having spent $6.5 million on lobbying, campaign donations and other political expenditures since 2009.

Document Sources.Sourced Statement: The Tennessee Association of Realtors has been Swann’s top funder since the start of 2009, according to the Tennessee Lookout, giving him $18,750.
